meanings.definition: The quality or characteristic of resembling or imitating an ape.
meanings.sent1: Her apishness in climbing trees amazed everyone at the zoo.
meanings.sent2: The child's apishness in mimicking the monkey made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent3: His apishness in trying to swing from the vines was both funny and endearing.
meanings.sent4: The actor's apishness on stage brought the character to life in a unique way.
meanings.sent5: The apishness of the costume made the performer look like a real ape.

meanings.definition: Behavior or actions that are foolish or silly.
meanings.sent1: The comedian's apishness had the audience roaring with laughter.
meanings.sent2: Her apishness in class always lightened the mood during lectures.
meanings.sent3: The dog's apishness in chasing its tail never failed to entertain the kids.
meanings.sent4: His apishness at the party made him the center of attention.
meanings.sent5: The apishness of his dance moves made everyone smile.
